Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.nkrusch.spacelaunchone.app.Utilities

extends java.lang.Object

        public static int[] fullTimeDiff(java.lang.Long utc)
        Get time remaining until some future event
        Parameters:
        utc - event timestamp in UTC
        Returns:
        [days, hours, minutes, seconds] if event has already passed all values will be zero i.e. [0,0,0,0]

      • clamp

        public static int clamp(int min,
                        int max,
                        int value)
        Clamp integer value within min-max range. If value is between min and max this function will return value. If value is less than min, this function will return min. If value is above max, this function will return max.
